task.title: Post a Local Request
task.shortdesc: Ask for local help or guidance through .

prereq.p: You must have active account and be signed in.

step.cmd: Tap Post Reuest on the home screen.
Choose a category for your request (e.g., Tour guide, Translation, Transportation).
Set your prefered language(s) for communication.
Tap Post to publish yor request.

result.p: Your request will now be visible to nearby verified guides.
